mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BS_ALARM (ALARMNO, BABYNO, USERNO, ALARMTITLE,ALARMTYPE,ALARMTIME) VALUES (BS_ALARMSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{babyNo}, #{userNo}, #{alarmTitle}, #{alarmType}, TO_DATE(#{alarmTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') )

INSERT INTO BS_ALARM (ALARMNO, BABYNO, USERNO, ALARMTITLE,ALARMTYPE, ALARMAMOUNT,ALARMTIME) VALUES (BS_ALARMSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{babyNo}, #{userNo}, #{alarmTitle}, #{alarmType}, #{alarmAmount}, TO_DATE(#{alarmTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') )

INSERT INTO BS_ALARM (ALARMNO, BABYNO, USERNO, ALARMTITLE,ALARMTYPE,ALARMTIME,ENDTIME) VALUES (BS_ALARMSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{babyNo}, #{userNo}, #{alarmTitle}, #{alarmType}, TO_DATE(#{alarmTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') TO_DATE(#{endTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') )
mapper.update: UPDATE BS_ALARM SET BABYNO=#{babyNo}, ALARMTITLE=#{alarmTitle},ALARMTYPE=#{alarmType},ALARMTIME=TO_DATE(#{alarmTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') WHERE ALARMNO = #{alarmNo}
UPDATE BS_ALARM SET BABYNO=#{babyNo}, ALARMTITLE=#{alarmTitle},ALARMTYPE=#{alarmType},ALARMAMOUNT=#{alarmAmount},ALARMTIME=TO_DATE(#{alarmTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') WHERE ALARMNO = #{alarmNo}

UPDATE BS_ALARM SET BABYNO=#{babyNo}, ALARMTITLE=#{alarmTitle},ALARMTYPE=#{alarmType},ALARMTIME=TO_DATE(#{alarmTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),ENDTIME=TO_DATE(#{endTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') WHERE ALARMNO = #{alarmNo}
mapper.select: SELECT ALARMNO, BABYNO, USERNO, BABYNAME||':'||ALARMTITLE AS ALARMTITLE, TO_CHAR(ALARMTIME,'AM HH:MI') AS "ALARMTIME" FROM BS_ALARM NATURAL JOIN BS_BABY WHERE ((USERNO = #{userNo}) AND (TO_CHAR(ALARMTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'))) ORDER BY ALARMTIME
